titleStmt.title: A discussion of that great point in divinity, the sufferings of Christ; and the question about his righteousnesse active, passive : and the imputation thereof. Being an answer to a dialogue intituled The meritorious price of redemption, justification, &c. / By John Norton teacher of the church at Ipswich in New-England. Who was appointed to draw up this answer by the generall court.
titleStmt.author: Norton, John, 1606-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Geo. Calvert at the Sign of the half Moon, and Joseph Nevill at the Sign of the Plough in the new buildings in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Pynchon, William. The meritorious price of our redemption, justification, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
